author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-KBR Awarded EPCM Contract By BOC To Develop Majnoon Field In Iraq
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - KBR Inc:
* KBR AWARDED EPCM CONTRACT BY BOC TO DEVELOP MAJNOON FIELD IN IRAQ
* KBR INC - ESTIMATED REVENUE FROM CONTRACT WILL BE BOOKED INTO HYDROCARBONS SERVICES BUSINESS SEGMENT AS WORK ORDERS ARE RELEASED Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
